Package me.dnorris.game

Interface GameData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicGameData
    public interface GameData
    Interface for all information stored about the Pool game

      • getTeamColour

        Gets the colour of ball the team is allowed to pot
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Team's ball colour - null if yet to be decided

      • setTeamColour

                   java.awt.Color color)
        Updates the team's ball colour
        Parameters:

        color - The team's new ball colour

      • isOnBlackBall

        boolean isOnBlackBall​(Team team)
        Determines if a team can pot the black ball based on how many of their colour ball remain on the table. If their colour hasn't been decided it will return false.
        Parameters:
        team - Team being checked
        Returns:
        If the team can pot the black ball
